title: Gen Li
text:
Gen Li PhD Student, Aalto University
 






I am a PhD researcher in Aalto University focusing on lignin valorisation, Ni-based catalysis, and computational modeling.
My research integrates experiments and simulations to unlock the potential of biomass-derived chemicals.




2025.07 One paper submitted to Applied Catalysis B 🧪

2025.06 Presented lignin solvolysis results at EHLCATHOL Workshop in Turku 🇫🇮

2025.05 Designed a room-temperature lignin solvent system 🌱

title: 你好，我是 Gen Li
text:
你好，我是 Gen Li
我在奥卢大学从事木质素转化与催化研究。
